cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 23rd Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 23rd Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Please note you will need to bring your own sleeping bag and/or linen when staying in this room type. There are beds but no linen provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Basic 28 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our world famous large dorm. It is divided into sections no greater than eight beds. Great for large parties like school groups or sports teams. Each bunk has it\'s own privacy curtain.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Two small bunkrooms with two bunks in each. Whatamango Bay is in the middle of the hostel with windows to the hallway off of the main lounge. Nirvana is off the back hallway behind the kitchen.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only

dorms.name: Standard 5 Bed Male Dorm
dorms.description: Male dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards. They offer male accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Small dorm off of the hallway behind the kitchen. This room opens onto the small outdoor porch. Has two bunks and one single bed.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Rangi a 4 poster double bed. It is located next to the kitchen so can be a bit noisy and only has a skylight for natural light.
Flipper Small double bedroom off the main lounge. windows open to the central corridor only. Good for sleeping during the day.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private family room with one double and one single bed. It also has a sliding door opening onto the small back porch.
